title: Ground News - Colder temperatures across the region with potential winter storm impacts in the eastern plains this weekend
text:
Summary by KULR-TV A strong winter storm is expected to impact much of the region starting Saturday evening through Sunday. Temperatures will drop from the upper 30s and 40s Saturday, to the low to upper 20s Sunday. Several inches of snow will also… Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
